verbose_text: By detailed analysis of the time course of NF-kappaB activation, we found that UBE2L3 in conjunction with LUBAC had a more potent effect in dysregulating the late phase of TNF induced NF-kappaB activation, peaking at 9-10 hr, and that this effect could be suppressed by variant p.Cys885Ser HOIP, confirming that the effect of UBE2L3 on NF-kappaB is mediated through its interaction with HOIP.
